content: CFS-T cable module Modules to seal cables/pipes within a transit frame when high water- and gas-tightness and fire-resistance are required ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Cable transit frames and penetration sealing systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Simplified inventory management – only 7 different modules are needed to cover all cable diameters from 3 to 99 mm Versatile adapter modules for quicker, easier accommodation of each cable diameter Time-saving installation thanks to module interlinking, especially where cables run vertically through deck/floor penetrations Color-coded adapter system to make inspection easier and more reliable Cable modules (up to size 40 mm) are supplied in a joined-together state and can be easily separated for individual use. Applications Penetrations in shipbuilding and offshore applications Penetrations in wind power structures Telecom, datacenter, downstream (oil and gas), petrochem, control rooms, healthcare, emergency power and transmission towers For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approvals: UL Temperature resistance range: -40 - 122 °F Free from: Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) Technical Data | Approvals | UL | Temperature resistance range | -40 - 122 °F | Free from | Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) | Reaction to fire class (EN 13501-1) | E ### ITEMS- 2014595 - CFS-T 15/09 cable module - Package Size 64 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-T 15 L 6-8 Adapter grey - 2014596 - CFS-T 20/012 cable module - Package Size 36 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-T 20 L 8-10 Adapter grey - 2014597 - CFS-T 30/023 cable module - Package Size 16 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-T 30 L 17-21 Adapter grey - 2014598 - CFS-T 40/033 cable module - Package Size 9 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-T 40 L 27-31 Adapter grey - 2014599 - CFS-T 60/051 cable module - Package Size 4 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-T 60 L 39-43 Adapter grey - 1x CFS-T 60 XL 44-48 Adapter red - 2014860 - Cable module CFS-T 90/0+52-78 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-T 90 L 58-63 Adapter grey - 1x CFS-T 90 XL 64-69 Adapter red - 1x CFS-T 90 XXL 70-75 Adapter black - 2060670 - Cable Transit Cable Module - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-T 120 L 85-90 Adapter grey - 1x CFS-T 120 XL 91-96 Adapter red - 2014861 - CFS-T 120/099 cable module - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-T 120 L 85-90 Adapter grey - 1x CFS-T 120 XL 91-96 Adapter red
